comment: GAB Management has been totally irresponsible in providing a forum for unabashed Nazis and antiSemites. There are limits to free speech, and a mute button is NOT the answer. Theres nothing socially healthy about the free public exchange of blatant hate speech.
amr:
# ::snt GAB Management has been totally irresponsible in providing a forum for unabashed Nazis and antiSemites. There are limits to free speech, and a mute button is NOT the answer. Theres nothing socially healthy about the free public exchange of blatant hate speech.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / responsible-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (p / provide-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "GAB"
                              :op2 "Management"))
                  :ARG1 (f / forum
                        :beneficiary (a / and
                              :op1 (p2 / person
                                    :mod (p3 / political-movement
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Nazism")))
                              :op2 (p4 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (o2 / oppose-01
                                          :ARG1 (e / ethnic-group
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Jew"))))
                              :ARG1-of (u / unabashed-02)))
                  :degree (t / total))
            :snt2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (l / limit-01
                        :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                              :ARG3-of (f2 / free-04)))
                  :op2 (a3 / answer-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG2 (b / button
                              :ARG0-of (m2 / mute-01))))
            :snt3 (h / healthy
                  :mod (s2 / social)
                  :domain (e2 / exchange-01
                        :ARG1 (s3 / speak-01
                              :ARG3-of (p5 / public-02)
                              :mod (b2 / blatant)
                              :ARG3-of (h2 / hate-01))
                        :ARG1-of (f3 / free-04)))))

comment: Rather than a mute button I would like a filter to block such sewage. Re: Above. All I'd see is the words Freedom Hating. I can live w/that.
amr:
# ::snt Rather than a mute button I would like a filter to block such sewage. Re: Above. All I'd see is the words Freedom Hating. I can live w/that.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / instead-of-91
            :ARG1 (l / like-02
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (f / filter-02
                        :ARG0-of (b / block-01
                              :ARG1 (s / sewage
                                    :mod (s2 / such)))))
            :ARG2 (b2 / button
                  :ARG0-of (m2 / mute-01)))
      :snt2 (c / concern-02
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / comment-01)
                  :location (a / above)))
      :snt3 (s3 / see-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (w / word-01
                  :ARG1 (h / hate-01
                        :ARG1 (f2 / free-04)))
            :mod (a2 / all))
      :snt4 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (l2 / live-01
                  :ARG0 (ii4 / i)
                  :manner (t2 / that))))

comment: Please express yourself in a way that is less despicable because it hurts everyone.
amr:
